page.title: 04MOTORWAYS _ GENERAL
page.content: MOTORWAYS ARE MAJOR ROUTEWAYS, USUALLY COMPRISING TWO OR THREE LANES WITH A HARD SHOULDER. THE TIME/DISTANCE ALONG THESE ROADS IS MUCH LESS OWING TO THE HIGHER SPEED LIMIT AND STRAIGHTER ROADS. MOTORWAYS ARE ESSENTIAL TO THE NECESSARY FAST COMMUNICATIONS OF TODAY BECAUSE OF INCREASING PRIVATE CAR OWNERSHIP AND INCREASED TRANSPORTATION OF MANUFACTURED GOODS BY ROAD. MOTORWAYS OCCUPY OFTEN VALUABLE FARM LAND AND RESIDENTIAL AREAS AND HAVE BEEN A MAJOR CAUSE FOR CONTROVERSY THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY. CONSERVATIONISTS ARE NEARLY ALWAYS PRESENT WHEN SURVEYS ARE BEING CARRIED OUT. ADMITTEDLY,THESE LINKWAYS ARE NOT VERY ATTRACTIVE;THEIR HUGE CONCRETE BRIDGES,FLY_OVERS,HIGH EMBANKMENTS AND POLLUTION OF THE SURROUNDING AREA ARE ALL VERY TYPICAL.
